categoriesExplanation:
The video is clearly centered around an elliptical workout, as indicated by the title 'Insane 15 Minute Elliptical Workout - HIIT Workout', tags such as 'elliptical workout', and the repeated emphasis on elliptical training in the description. The score for 'Elliptical' is 1.0 due to the direct and explicit focus on using an elliptical machine throughout the workout, which is a defining characteristic of the workout as it is mentioned consistently across all metadata.

The workout is also categorized as 'HIIT' with a score of 0.9, as the workout is described as a high-intensity interval training session. The description explicitly outlines the structure of HIIT with '6 rounds of 30 seconds, spaced with 90 seconds of low intensity,' and emphasizes pushing to the max during bursts, which is characteristic of HIIT workouts. The tags and description both reinforce the HIIT nature of the workout. The only reason for not assigning a perfect score is due to the primary equipment used focusing the context more on the elliptical itself.
